name: Shapes Of Tiny-Pets League
description:
Shapes Of Tiny is a adventure game for kids.
An elephant? a mouse? a hare? or maybe all of the 3 together? the wizard cursed the hero, so it became that weird creature, but, there is a good in every bad, now you can switch forms! Win each and every level by transforming to the best creature. Collect the stars, get to the exit and win the game.

Game Features:
- Three pets' amazing adventures
- Join three pets and explore the unknown magic world
- Collect the stars,get to the exit and win the game
